title: Nokia targets ‘broader potential of metaverse’ in 2030 strategy
description:
Nokia’s Technology Strategy 2030 report revealed the company’s plans to invest heavily in its network equipment and services portfolio over the coming years.

Telecoms infrastructure firm Nokia anticipates a spike in network demand owing to upcoming advances in metaverse, Web3 and artificial intelligence (AI), and plans to fill this gap by 2030.

Nokia’s Technology Strategy 2030 report focuses on building a future network architecture to serve the emerging innovations market. Nokia anticipates a 22% to 25% increase in network demand from 2022 through 2030. Federico Guillén, the president of network infrastructure at Nokia, attributed the rise to the recent mainstream introduction of generative AI and virtual reality devices.

The company’s strategy involves investing heavily in its portfolio of network equipment and services over the coming years. Internet of Value is one of the six ecosystems Nokia will cater to, focusing on decentralization, blockchain and smart contracts. Nokia’s focus on metaverse will be on human augmentation, spatial computing and split processing.

Read more

title: Ethereum Layer-2 Network Blast Launches Official Mainnet
description: The launch of the Blast mainnet unlocks nearly $2.3 billion in staked crypto, with users having already withdrawn $400 million from the network.

title: HFSC votes to overturn SEC guideline on crypto custody
description: In a decisive move, the House Financial Services Committee (HFSC) has voted in favor of a resolution to overturn a guideline set forth by the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) regarding crypto custody. The resolution seeks to nullify Staff Accounting Bulletin No. 121 (SAB 121), introduced in March 2022, which mandates that institutions […]

title: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce advocates for decentralization in the U.S. financial system
description: United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Commissioner Hester Peirce, known colloquially as “Crypto Mom,” emphasized the importance of decentralization in the U.S. financial system during her recent appearance at the ETH Denver conference.  Peirce, renowned for her supportive stance towards the cryptocurrency industry, expressed concerns regarding centralized structures within the financial system, citing concentrated […]

title: A Decade of Ethereum: Developer’s Unexpected Revelation as Ethereum Network Nears Milestone
